Name: HotGirls Sliding Puzzle
About the game: Challenging sliding puzzles, featuring sexy girls and waitresses in a night club. Discover beautiful women in a nightclub setting by solving puzzles. Relaxing background music to match the theme and mood. Features: 12 different puzzles to solve 3 levels of difficulty: 3x3, 4x4 and 5x5 Timer, to see how long it takes to solve a puzzle Gallery where you can view all the puzzle images you have solved. Be among the fastest puzzle solvers to achieve a top spot in our Leaderboards and unlock various achievements.
